iati-activity.title: NGO WATSAN Consortium
iati-activity.description: To provide medium-term transition support to the Government of Liberia and the Liberia Water and Sewer Corporation for the ongoing provision of Water and Sanitation facilities. To ensure that targeted war affected communities have improved access to consumption of safe water and carry out improved sanitation and hygeine practises. To jointly develop and implement a long-term strategy for the provision of urban and rural water services.

iati-activity.title: Liberia Reconstruction Programme
iati-activity.description: The Liberia Reconstruction Trust Fund was jointly established by the Government of Liberia and the World Bank to promote the Liberia Partners Forum held in June 2008. It is intended to be the main mechanism for donor support for one of the country's highest priority needs, the rehabilitation of badly deteriorated roads and other major infrastructure.

iati-activity.title: Forest Governance, Markets and Climate
